recipesJson.name: Pinky
recipesJson.author: MrBurgundy
recipesJson.description:
Strawberry ice cream

I haven't done many public recipes lately, so I whipped this super easy one together to kick me back into gear. 

Flavor Notes:

4% CAP Sweet Strawberry and 3% TPA Strawberry form a solid strawberry with sweet top notes and a fleshy body.

3% TPA VBIC, 1% HS FVIC, and 0.5% FA Meringue create a rich and buttery ice cream base.

Just a touch of sweetener was included because it really helps me taste strawberries and because it's ice cream.

Optionally, throw in 0.3-0.5% JF Biscuit for some added complexity if you want the classic profile.

Shake and vape certified. I prefer a good 1-2 week steep on it, but there's never enough to last that long.

Happy mixing. ðŸ‘½

reviews.text: When I make this again, I'll probably sub Strawberry Ripe in for TPA strawb, but the cream base is nice and rich.
